text:
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION
OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF THE REGIONAL DIRECT'
Television — Region VI
IRECTOfi
October li.
Dear Bills
I am in complete accord with your letter of Sept, 20th
to Jack White.
Elisabeth and I are leaving here Monday the 10th to
make a leisurely drive to San Francisco. We will be
in sometime on Friday afternoon, I suppose. We have
a dinner engagement with my brother and a group, but
I’ll see you sometime Friday afternoon, if you are
in then.
I understand from Harry there are no separate TV and
Radio Board meetings being planned, so I have not
tried to put together anything for a separate meeting.
